creator: ORIGAME
descriptionHtml:
Word Guru: Guess the word

An interesting game and a pleasant visual content allow you to relax, while gaining new knowledge.

4000 + LEVELS OF CROSSWORDS FOR YOU!

How many words can you guess? Do you think that knowing the alphabet is enough for success? Of course not! You must learn, learn, and learn again! Solving such crosswords is not easy, you will need a rich vocabulary. Guess the words, collect thoughtful crosswords and pass each level, each puzzle and overcome all the difficulties that will arise along the way. If you encounter any problems, you can get a hint using the earned coins! And if you run out of coins, you can top them up at any time by watching ads!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Find the answer to the question and swipe your finger over the letters to fill in the guessed word.
- Collect combos of words in a row to earn coins.
- Collect bonus words to get bonus coins.
- Find all the words and complete the grid of crosswords.

Word Guru: Crosswords with questions

In this wonderful game you can combine letters into words and solve crosswords in each of them!

WORD GAME-TEST AND EXPAND YOUR VOCABULARY WITH THE HELP OF GAME ELEMENTS

Features

* Beautiful design
* Thousands of crosswords for something new at each level
* 4000 levels-all unique
* Crosswords are becoming more and more difficult - develop and improve

Bonuses

* Catch a UFO before it flies away
* Defuse the bomb and get bonuses
* Catch the little monster before it runs away
descriptionShort: Answer questions, solve crosswords! All this is in the game World Guru!
title: Word Guru: Find the word—Crossword with questions

creator: ORIGAME
descriptionHtml:
Crossword Guru - A word search & word guess brain game. WOW Guru is a fun and relaxing word game in a crossword-style format made for the smartest brains!

4000 + LEVELS OF CROSSWORDS FOR YOU!

Swipe the letters to find and guess the hidden words in a crossword-style grid!

How many words can you guess? Solving such crosswords is not easy, you will need a rich vocabulary. Guess the words, collect thoughtful crosswords and pass each level, each puzzle and overcome all the difficulties that will arise along the way. If you encounter any problems, you can get a hint using the earned coins! And if you run out of coins, you can top them up at any time by watching ads!

If you are a word game lover and like to play brain games to improve your vocabulary or simply enjoy word search games to casually swipe and guess the hidden words, Word Jam - A Word Search & Word Guess Brain game is the perfect choice for the best brain game lovers!

HOW TO PLAY:
- Find the answer to the question and swipe your finger over the letters to fill in the guessed word.
- Collect combos of words in a row to earn coins.
- Collect bonus words to get bonus coins.
- Find all the words and complete the grid of crosswords.

In this wonderful game you can combine letters into words and solve crosswords in each of them!

Features

* Beautiful design
* Thousands of crosswords for something new at each level
* 4000 levels-all unique
* Crosswords are becoming more and more difficult - develop and improve
descriptionShort: Word guess brain game! Answer questions, solve WOW crosswords and Wordscapes!
title: Crossword Guru: Guess Word Jam
